transportAdvice: The tourist zone along the marina and Medano Beach is walkable, but distances between resorts, downtown, and the corridor can be long in the heat. Taxis are widely available and the primary mode of transport for tourists; public buses run along the main corridor but are infrequent and not always convenient for resort areas.

weather.description: Sunny and dry with warm days and cool evenings, making it one of the most pleasant months to visit.
Continued dry and sunny conditions with comfortable temperatures and low humidity.
Warm and dry with clear skies; ideal beach weather begins to build.
Temperatures rise noticeably with very little rain and plenty of sunshine.
Getting hotter with slightly rising humidity, though rain remains rare.
Early summer brings heat and the beginning of occasional afternoon showers.
Hot and humid with increased chances of brief tropical showers, especially in the afternoon.
Peak summer heat with high humidity and the highest risk of tropical storms or hurricanes.
The wettest month of the year with the greatest hurricane risk; heavy downpours are common.
Rain begins to taper off and temperatures ease, though humidity remains noticeable.
Conditions improve significantly with warm, dry days and comfortable evenings returning.
Dry and sunny with mild temperatures; a popular month for visitors escaping northern winters.
